.. _api.webapp2_extras.routes:

Extra routes
============
.. module:: webapp2_extras.routes

This module provides several extra route classes for convenience:
domain and subdomain routing, prefixed routes or routes for automatic
redirection.

.. autoclass:: DomainRoute
   :members: __init__

.. autoclass:: RedirectRoute
   :members: __init__

.. autoclass:: PathPrefixRoute
   :members: __init__

.. autoclass:: NamePrefixRoute
   :members: __init__

.. autoclass:: HandlerPrefixRoute
   :members: __init__
